title: Call Center Agent (US/UK/AU Voice Process) C2 ONLY
job_overview:
Location: Work From Home/Remote

English Level Required: C2 ONLY

Education: HSC / Undergraduate / Graduate

Experience Required: Minimum 1 year in US or UK or AUS Voice Process.

Shift: Fully variable time zone, sometimes in US time zone, sometimes in UK time zone and sometimes in AUS time zone.

Salary: $1000/mo

Mandatory: 

English Level Required: C2 ONLY
Minimum 1 year in US or UK or AUS Voice Process.
The candidate must possess excellent communication skills
Candidate must have proven track record in handling inbound processes in international process.
Excellent verbal communication skills in English.
A proactive and customer-centric attitude.
A reliable laptop/desktop on Windows.
Minimum 20 Mbps wired internet connection.
Wired headset with clear audio quality.
Quiet, distraction-free workspace.
Stable power supply and internet connectivity.

What does the job involve:

Handle inbound/outbound calls and resolve customer queries promptly.
Maintain a calm and professional tone under pressure.
Address complaints with empathy and ensure customer satisfaction.
Accurately log call details as per company procedures.
Show enthusiasm and commitment to quality customer service.
